description:
Makina`s Ditto, Number 1, is a normally colored Ditto that transformed into Gible. Her Ditto`s had wandered away from her and started causing trouble for Ash and his friends as they were transforming into their Pok√©mon and making them mad.
During a battle with Ash, it transformed into Piplup but Pikachu`s Thunderbolt was effective against it. It then transformed into a Pikachu, but was no match for Ash`s Pikachu.
Team Rocket stole the Ditto`s and planned to give them to the boss but Ash and his friends were able to recover both of them.
name: Metamon #1 (Makina)
